SocialMediaPosting.headline: Dr. Jennifer Tepe’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope for increased access to opportunity for children of all abilities within our school system…”

– Dr. Jennifer Tepe, Instructor @PittEducation @UIC_CollegeofEd https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2021/increased-access-opportunity-all-children-school-system/
